text: Josh Simm is an English professional rugby league footballer who plays as a for St Helens in the Super League. He has spent time on loan from Saints at the Leigh Centurions in the Betfred Championship. In the 2019 under 19s academy season, Simm scored a total of 30 tries in 20 games, beating his previous season's total of 29 tries in 23 games. ==Background== Simm was born in St Helens, England. He is the grandson of St Helens legend Geoff Pimblett. ==Career== Simm made his Super League début for Saints against the London Broncos in July 2019. ==References== ==External links== *St Helens profile *SL profile *Saints Heritage Society profile Category:Living people Category:Rugby league centres Category:St Helens R.F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from St Helens, Merseyside Category:2001 births
title: Josh Simm
